name: Wolfenstein 3D Game Data
summary: Learn about .WL3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: iD Software released three versions of Wolfenstein 3D. The first, which was a shareware version that included only one episode, stored game data in .WL1 files. The second, which was a registered version that included three episodes, stored game data in WL3 files. The third, which included six episodes, stored game data in .WL6 files.
All versions of Wolfenstein 3D contain nine default game data files. In the three-episode version of Wolfenstein 3D, these files are named:

description: A WL3 file is a game data file used by the three-episode version of Wolfenstein 3D, the first game in id Software's Wolfenstein series. It may contain sprites, textures, sounds, maps, or other game data. Modders sometimes modify the data WL3 files contain, to customize Wolfenstein 3D.

instructions: Various Wolfenstein 3D modding programs allow you to open WL3 files and edit or extract the game data they contain. For example, you can open many WL3 files in SLADE (multiplatform) and Havoc's Wolf3D Editor (Windows).
